resources.string:
Hi, my name is Mario. 

 I am a programmer, I have classified to ICPC Mexico Finals and I have won coding Cup TecNM. 

 I can code in several languages like C, C++, Java, C#, Phyton, Javascript, PHP, Kotlin. And I know other technologies like MYSQL, HTML, CSS, REACT, etc. 

 My favorite subject is Networks and DataBases subjects.
